homepage.title: Minecraft Helper
homepage.subtitle: Your complete toolkit for managing Minecraft modpacks and launchers

multiLauncher.title: Multi-Launcher Support
multiLauncher.description: Works with AstralRinth, Prism, XMCL, and more

autoUpdate.title: Auto Updates
autoUpdate.description: Keep your modpacks up to date automatically

welcome.title: Welcome to NAHA Minecraft Helper
welcome.description: NAHA Minecraft Helper simplifies the installation process and server setup for Minecraft, making it easier than ever to jump into the game. Let's get started!
welcome.tip: This setup will help you configure your Minecraft experience

minecraftCheck.title: Do you have Minecraft installed?
minecraftCheck.description: Minecraft is required to play on NAHA servers. If you don't have it, we'll guide you through the simple installation process to get you started.

chooseLauncher.title: Which launcher do you have?
chooseLauncher.description: Select the launcher you currently use to play Minecraft. This will help us configure your setup correctly.
chooseLauncher.noLaunchers: No launchers detected. Please install a launcher first.

descriptions.prism: A user-friendly launcher with mod support.

serverSelection.title: Choose Your Server
serverSelection.description: Select which NAHA server you'd like to join and play on.

descriptions.fabric: Modern mod loader with excellent performance and compatibility.
descriptions.neoforge: Advanced modpack with creative building and automation.
descriptions.forge: Classic mod loader with extensive mod support.
descriptions.btw: Hardcore survival experience with unique mechanics.

fabric.name: Fabric
fabric.subtitle: Light
fabric.description: Modern mod loader with excellent performance and compatibility.

neoforge.name: NeoForge
neoforge.subtitle: Create
neoforge.description: Advanced modpack with creative building and automation.

forge.name: Forge
forge.subtitle: Unavailable
forge.description: Classic mod loader with extensive mod support.

btw.name: Better Than Wolves
btw.subtitle: Unavailable
btw.description: Hardcore survival experience with unique mechanics.

installLauncher.title: Install a Minecraft Launcher
installLauncher.description: You'll need a launcher to play Minecraft. We recommend one of these options:
installLauncher.subtitle: We'll download and install the launcher for you automatically.

createInstance.title: Create Instance
createInstance.description: Ready to install your selected modpack and launcher configuration.
createInstance.installerDescription: The installer will automatically download and install your modpack.

completion.title: Installation Complete!
completion.description: Your Minecraft setup has been successfully configured and is ready to use.

steps.launchDescription: Open {launcher} from your desktop or start menu
steps.signInDescription: Sign in with your Minecraft account (if required by your launcher)
steps.createInstanceDescription: Create a new instance or import the {modpack} modpack
steps.startPlayingDescription: Launch your instance and start playing with your favorite mods!

launcherSelection.title: Select Your Minecraft Launcher
launcherSelection.description: Choose which launcher contains the instances you want to update

modpackSelection.title: Choose Your Modpack Type
modpackSelection.description: Select the type of modpack you want to update

instanceSelection.title: Pick Your Instance
instanceSelection.description: Select which instance you want to update

about.title: About NAHA MC Helper
about.description: Minecraft modpack and launcher management tool

resetData.title: Reset Application Data
resetData.message: Are you sure you want to reset all application data to factory settings?
resetData.detail: This will clear all settings, cache, and user data. This action cannot be undone.
